siteMetadata.subtitle: I belong to no religion, my religion is LOVE and every heart is my Temple (Rumi)

frontmatter.title: Telar Social Media Architecture using Domain Driven Design for Microservices
frontmatter.description: In this Article you will learn about Telar Social Architecture and how it helps to boost your productivity, development Speed, flexibility, scalability and so on. We are not going deep in DDD and Microservices but how we used them in Telar Social in a nutshell.
